message:
A campaign date has been stuck in a queued state for at least 4 hours. The campaigns for this employer might just need to be [unlocked]

**Priority Level: P1**

(https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/2601255289/Campaigns+Debugging#Campaign-Lock-Delay) or the campaign might have [errors](https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/2601255289/Campaigns+Debugging#Error-Checking)

@slack-incidents-emp-outreach <!subteam^S022HA38ZRA> @jira-campaigns
name: Campaign Stuck in Queue
